project_description: A simple Flutter app that toggles between displaying 'Cat' and 'Dog' text with respective icons when the text is clicked.
architecture_overview: The project uses the Cubit pattern for state management, separating business logic from UI code. The app has a single screen that interacts with a Cubit to manage its state.

files.name: lib/main.dart
files.description: Entry point of the Flutter app. It sets up the Cubit provider and displays the HomeScreen.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main method to run the app

files.name: lib/screens/home_screen.dart
files.description: Defines the HomeScreen widget that displays the AnimalDisplay widget and uses the AnimalCubit for state management.

files.name: lib/cubits/animal_cubit.dart
files.description: Defines the AnimalCubit and AnimalState for managing the state of the displayed animal.

methods.name: toggleAnimal
methods.description: Toggles the displayed animal between 'Cat' and 'Dog'

files.name: lib/models/animal.dart
files.description: Defines the Animal model representing the different animals to be displayed.

methods.name: toJson
methods.description: Converts the Animal instance to a JSON map.

methods.name: fromJson
methods.description: Creates an Animal instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: _iconFromString
methods.description: Converts a string representation of an icon to an IconData object.

files.name: lib/widgets/animal_display.dart
files.description: Defines the AnimalDisplay widget that shows the current animal and its icon.

widgets.name: HomeScreen
widgets.description: The main screen of the app that displays the AnimalDisplay widget.

widgets.name: AnimalDisplay
widgets.description: Widget that displays the current animal and its icon.

cubits.name: AnimalCubit
cubits.description: Manages the state of the displayed animal, toggling between 'Cat' and 'Dog'.

methods.name: toggleAnimal
methods.description: Toggles the displayed animal between 'Cat' and 'Dog'

models.name: Animal
models.description: Represents an animal with a name and icon.

dependencies.name: flutter
dependencies.purpose: Flutter framework for building the UI

dependencies.name: flutter_bloc
dependencies.purpose: State management using the Cubit pattern

dependencies.name: bloc_test
dependencies.purpose: Testing utilities for Bloc and Cubit

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
participant HomeScreen
participant AnimalCubit
participant AnimalDisplay
User -> HomeScreen: launch
HomeScreen -> AnimalCubit: get state
AnimalCubit -> HomeScreen: return state
HomeScreen -> AnimalDisplay: render animal
User -> AnimalDisplay: click text
AnimalDisplay -> AnimalCubit: toggleAnimal
AnimalCubit -> HomeScreen: update state
HomeScreen -> AnimalDisplay: re-render animal
@enduml
state_management_flow: State is managed using the Cubit pattern. The AnimalCubit manages the state of the displayed animal. When the user clicks on the animal text, the toggleAnimal method is called, which toggles the state between 'Cat' and 'Dog'. The UI is updated automatically by listening to state changes in the Cubit.
navigation_flow: The app has a single screen (HomeScreen). The navigation is straightforward with no additional routes or screens.

pubspec_yaml.name: catdogapp
pubspec_yaml.description: A simple Flutter app to toggle between displaying 'Cat' and 'Dog' text with respective icons.
